title: LFM - Diamond/Challenger ADC + JUNGLE SUBS - Challenger Support for main roster
body:
Crowd Control Gaming is currently looking for new members to fill positions in their Challenger teams for the up and coming Open Ladder, the positions open are as follows:

**CCG Divine:** Looking for High Diamond/Challenger ADC + Jungle players to Sub in the Open Ladder. 

**CCG Ghosts:** Looking for a Challenger Support to play in their main roster - Sydney based preferred but not a requirement.

Both of these teams finished in the top 8 Challenger ladder at the end of season and are attempting to progress through the Open ladder and eventually reach the pro circuit. If you wish to apply or have any questions please contact **CCG Sheep** in game. 

Remember that time is not on our side and the Open Ladder will be commencing within a week 

Thank-you :)

replies.body: D5 ADC main interested in joining, I have previous tournament experince. extremely keen on any upcoming events. free schedule at the moment.
get Snugglexo as your support probs best support oce, got an offer from curse btw
